original_text: Then Hezekiah turned his face towards the wall and he prayed to the Lord.
korean_text: 히스기야가 얼굴을 벽으로 향하고 여호와께 기도하여

sentences.original_text: Then Hezekiah turned his face towards the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 히스기야는 자기 얼굴을 벽으로 돌렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and he prayed to the Lord
